EmailTemplate.subject: [Register Today] Experience the High Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
If you haven't registered for our webcast, Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™, it's not too late!
Tomorrow, you will find out how...
- JetWave enables video streaming, live TV, video conferencing and more
- Jet ConneX can provide global coverage
- To manage cost with JX plans that fit your connectivity goals
- Jet ConneX has the highest level of guaranteed minimum data rate
- Honeywell supports customers around the globe
Join our webcast September 11 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET to see for yourself how you can get revolutionary in-flight Wi-Fi for office and home-like connectivity in the sky.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201809_JetWave_WebCast.html]]>
